short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switching to next tab through the list of recent tabs, complementing the Recent Tabs Master, Recent Tabs Fast Forward

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to move forward through your list of recent tabs, created by the "Recent Tabs Master".

Works together with "Recent Tabs Master" only! 
Make sure that "Recent Tabs Master" is installed in your browser.

Installation
1.  Click "Add to Chrome" for  this extension.
2. Search for "Recent Tabs Forward" and "Recent Tabs Fast Forward".
Or use direct links:
- Recent Tabs Master - https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/recent-tabs-master/igpepgofglnhfpmgbcjkndcfjemhoaac
- Recent Tabs Fast Forward - https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/recent-tabs-fast-forward/kdiokjemgpcccpfemfcbkhfddjjmipfb

3. Click "Add to Chrome" for  each extension.
4. Once installed, you will see their icons on your Chrome toolbar. Pin it , if needed to make it visible all time.

Features:
Forward Navigation: Easily move to the next tab in your recent tabs list, after having navigated back with "Recent Tabs Master".

Usage: Install together with the "Recent Tabs Master" extension and pin them on the toolbar.
